properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 v2 c1 v3 v4 c1 v5 v6 c1 v7 v8 c1 v9 v10 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Glory to God in the highest,
glory to God in the highest,
(and peace to his people
on earth x4).

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lord God heavenly King,
glory to God.
Almighty and Father,
glory to God.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Lord God heavenly King,
glory to God.
Almighty and Father,
glory to God in the highest.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
We worship oh Lord,
glory to God.
We give you thanks oh Lord,
glory to God.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Our praise for your glory,
glory to God.
Christ Jesus son of God,
glory to God in the highest.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Lord God and Lamb of God,
glory to God,
Our sins you take away,
glory to God.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
And the sins of the world,
glory to God.
Have mercy on us Lord,
glory to God in the highest.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
You are the chosen one,
glory to God.
Seated at the right hand,
glory to God.

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
Right hand of the father,
glory to God.
Receive our prayers,
glory to God in the highest.

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
You are the only one,
glory to God.
Alone are the holy,
glory to God.

verse.name: v10
verse.lines:
You are the most high,
glory to God.
With the Holy Spirit,
glory to God in the highest.
